CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1946, pg. 32, reads: "New Discovery - Typical of the talent which seems come naturally to native sons of this town, Conrad Clark, 12-year-old piano stylist, plays a number off stage for members of the choral group. Conrad moved right into stardom with the other artists when he captured the audience with 'Begin the Beguine,' Eddie Haywood brand."
TitMainTitle: Conrad "Sonny" Clark seated at piano backstage at Syria Mosque for Night of Stars event
